Order Your Favorite Dish!

If you are vegan, vegetarian or you like meat we got you. We have bowls, wraps and more - You decide how you want your favorite dish!

Menu

That's how you order your food

Restaurant

We are delighted to welcome you to our restaurant with its unique ambience. we serve you both lunch and dinner.

Takeaway

You can order your favorite dish via telephone and pick it up at our store. It's easy and quick in few minutes we'll have your dish ready.

What our customers say about us

The food tasted incredibly good

Been eating Indian again for a long time, and I noticed that I should do it again and more often. The food tasted incredibly good, the staff was very nice and accommodating.
If I'm around again, I'll definitely come by again.

The staff is incredibly friendly

The staff is incredibly friendly, we felt immediately welcome. The ambience is so beautiful: the music in the background, the furnishings - wow! The food was so delicious and really flavorful. The meat was tender, the portions very, very big for the price. And the dessert was fresh and delicious too ...
